DataElement.preferredDefinition: The yes/no/not applicable coded response that indicates if the patient is receiving warfarin treatment.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information relating to patient warfarin treatment.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredDefinition: An anticoagulant that acts by inhibiting the synthesis of vitamin K-dependent coagulation factors. Warfarin is indicated for the prophylaxis and/or treatment of venous thrombosis and its extension, pulmonary embolism, and atrial fibrillation with embolization. It is also used as an adjunct in the prophylaxis of systemic embolism after myocardial infarction. Warfarin is also used as a rodenticide.:An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.

Concepts.definition: An anticoagulant that acts by inhibiting the synthesis of vitamin K-dependent coagulation factors. Warfarin is indicated for the prophylaxis and/or treatment of venous thrombosis and its extension, pulmonary embolism, and atrial fibrillation with embolization. It is also used as an adjunct in the prophylaxis of systemic embolism after myocardial infarction. Warfarin is also used as a rodenticide.
An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created to support Theradex design of CRFs for NCI CCR trials

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient require the use of coumarin-derivative anticoagulants such as warfarin?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received anticoagulation therapy with warfarin, or equivalent vitamin K antagonists, within the last 28 days prior to day 1 of ibrutinib?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient is enrolled to Arm 4 (capecitabine), was patient receiving warfarin?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient require treatment with warfarin?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 5
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is the patient on full dose coumarin-derivative anticoagulants such as warfarin?

DataElement.administrativeNotes: 2023.8.9 AQT added per ticket request CADSR0002718. ak
